synsets.definition: Deep introspective awareness of one's emotional states and their underlying causes, combining Sanskrit self-study practices with Japanese death-poem clarity of feeling
The ability to feel and express emotions with complete authenticity and communal awareness, drawing from African ubuntu interconnectedness and Latin American heart-wisdom
Precise spiritual and emotional knowing that penetrates the heart of feeling-states, encompassing Arabic mystical heart-knowledge and Hindi emotional clarity
A transformative journey toward complete emotional understanding, integrating Native American vision-seeking with Japanese gratitude-insight and Hebrew wise-heartedness
A state of profound emotional tranquility combined with piercing insight into feeling-states, merging Arabic psychological peace with Korean emotional insight and Sanskrit inner-vision
